name: Devin Sage
text: Ordered a pizza for delivery and arrived with a hair baked into the pizza, called and told them what happened and they simply just said they would resend another pizza and told me there would be a 35 min wait... not happy with the level of service

name: Shaela Anderson
text: The first girl that tried taking my order was rude and switched me to someone else without even telling me. When my order was delivered they forgot my 2 liter went back to get it and it took 30 min to get that after I called twice about it. And when I finally got it was no longer cold. Awesome first experience! (Eyeroll)

name: A Random Traveler
text: Can't speak for the location itself as I've always ordered delivery but the pizza and pasta always arrives hot, delicious, and on time.  The delivery staff is extremely friendly and efficient.  A+

name: Micah Fogleman
text: I always order online so I don't know how their phone skills are, but each time I pick up a pizza from this location the store is always clean and the staff are attentive. I have never had a order messed up from here.

name: Ukvayat Hanak
text: Fast service but double check your order because they may forget a crust option or extra side.

name: Matt Bradshaw
text: Buffett needs more variety but the service is good

name: KATHRYN WHITWOOD
text: Worst call service I have ever had. Talked to a representative named Kylie or Kyla and she hung up on me when I was giving an update to my order that I had already paid for. Been waiting over an hour for my order that had an estimated …More

name: Tiffany Gabriel
text: Fresh hot food great customer service

text: The delivery is very bad the pizzas are 2 hours late

text: The meat lovers was the bomb & the food was fresh.

name: Jay Broyles
text: FOOD IS SO GOOD... When you see ads on tv or in sunday paper tor some food somewhere... Im allways disappointed..  NOT HERE... There food always taste just as AMAZING AS IT LOOKS

name: Kandy Kay
text: I waited to withhold judgement until I got my food. However, I could not stop thinking about how rude the girl who answered the phone was. No hello, just "pizza hut can I help you?" She then proceeded to rush me off the phone and act like …More
